info.description: Documentum REST, Copyright 2020 Open Text corporation.
info.title: Documentum REST Services

put.summary: Enable and refresh the saved search results

collectionsParam.name: collections
collectionsParam.description: Specifies a list of collections separated by comma (,). to which the query is scoped. The collections must exist in xPlore.

contentFormatParam.name: format
contentFormatParam.description: Specifies the format name of the specific content or rendition.

contentModifierParam.name: modifier
contentModifierParam.description: Specifies the page modifier of the specific rendition.

contentPageParam.name: page
contentPageParam.description: Specifies the page number of the specific content or rendition.

facetIdConstraintsParam.name: facet-id-constraints
facetIdConstraintsParam.description: Contains the key value pairs for each facet id and its constraint. The id should comply with the facet id in the AQL.

facetParam.name: facet
facetParam.description: Specifies the property to be used as facet.

facetValueConstraintsParam.name: facet-value-constraints
facetValueConstraintsParam.description:
Specifies a property constraint expression. For example, when facet is set to r_object_type facet-value-constraints is set to dm_object, only dm_object instances are returned.

You can use boolean operators + for AND and | for OR in a property constraint expression to define more complex constraints. For example, the expression dm_object|dm_folder returns both dm_object and dm_folder instances.

Parameter facet-value-constraints must be encoded because it may contain non-English locale characters.

International characters that are used in this query parameter must be sent with URL encoded by the UTF-8 charset. Otherwise, the result may be incorrect.

filterParam.name: filter
filterParam.description: A filter expression in a subset of XPath.

includeTotalParam.name: include-total
includeTotalParam.description:
Indicate to calculate the total count of the feed items as though not returning them all in one page. When the result feed is paged, the attribute include-total will be displayed in the feed.
* true - the total count of feed items is calculated by server and returned
* false - neither calculate nor return the total count

inlineParam.name: inline
inlineParam.description: Ensures whether to show content (the object instance) in the atom entry for a collection. * 'true', return object instance and embed object instance into entry's content element. * 'false', do not return object instance within entry's content.

itemsPerPageParam.name: items-per-page
itemsPerPageParam.description: The number of entries per page. When the result feed is paged, the attribute items-per-page will be displayed in the feed.

limitParam.name: limit
limitParam.description: Defines the maximum of result range for each target repository.

linksParam.name: links
linksParam.description: Ensures whether link relations to be returned for this object representation. * 'true', return links for the object. * 'false' do not return links for the object.

locationsParam.name: locations
locationsParam.description:
Specifies a list of folder paths separated by comma (,) to which the query is scoped.

Parameter locations must be encoded because it may contain non-English locale characters.

International characters that are used in this query parameter must be sent with URL encoded by the UTF-8 charset. Otherwise, the result may be incorrect.

maxResultsCountParam.name: max-results-count
maxResultsCountParam.description:
The maximum number of results to for a saved search When -1 is used as the value for the max-results-count parameter, the Request may require more time to retrieve as many matching objects as possible. The number of matching objects returned is only limited by the DFC configuration. Using a default value of 1000 , which returns 10 pages at once by default, greatly improves performance.
-1: Apply the DFC configuration
Any non-negative integer: the smaller of max-results -count and DFC configuration takes effect.

pageParam.name: page
pageParam.description: The number of the page to be served. When the result feed is paged, the attribute page will be displayed in the feed.

qParam.name: q
qParam.description:
Specifies the search criterion with a full-text expression in Simple Search Language.

Parameter q must be encoded because it may contain non-English locale characters.

International characters that are used in this query parameter must be sent with URL encoded by the UTF-8 charset. Otherwise, the result may be incorrect.

sortParam.name: sort
sortParam.description:
Sorting for entries in collection result. A sort consists of multiple sort specifications, separated by comma (','). Each sort specification consists of an attribute to be sorted and its sort order, separated by the spacpe (' ').

Sort order can be either DESC orASC, case insensitive. Sort order is optional, if not specified, the default sort order isASC. Optionally it can be specified with non-repeating attributes. Sort order can be forced to be in case insensitive mode, with the hint no-case. Whether the default sort is in case sensitive mode or not is determined by the database.

Example: sort=r_modify_date desc,object_name asc no-case,title. If any attribute with invalid name is specified, error will be thrown.

startParam.name: start
startParam.description: Defines the start index of result range for each target repository.

timezoneParam.name: timezone
timezoneParam.description:
Indicates the time zone used to compute date facets. Valid time zones include (case-insensitive):
- Abbreviation, such as GMT and UTC
- Full names, such as America/Los_Angeles
- Custom time zones, such as GMT-8:00

includeChildrenParamVersioning.name: include-children
includeChildrenParamVersioning.description: Whether include the children of virtual document.

requireDcWriteParamVersioning.name: require-dc-write
requireDcWriteParamVersioning.description: Whether a document requires distributed content write while being created

includeBrokenParamVersioning.name: include-broken
includeBrokenParamVersioning.description: Specifies whether to include nodes with broken bindings for a virtual document. * 'true', would include nodes with broken bindings with current version. * 'false', do not include nodes with broken bindings.

formatParamVersioning.name: format
formatParamVersioning.description: The format of the content uploaded.

networkLocationParamVersioning.name: network-location
networkLocationParamVersioning.description: The network location for distributed content write.

asyncParamVersioning.name: async
asyncParamVersioning.description: Whether async upload when distributed content writing.

forceCheckoutParamVersioning.name: force-checkout
forceCheckoutParamVersioning.description: Specify whether to check out virtual document components forcefully.

contentLengthParamVersioning.name: content-length
contentLengthParamVersioning.description: The length of the content uploaded.

bindingLabelParamVersioning.name: binding-label
bindingLabelParamVersioning.description: Specifies the version label to use to resolve late bound nodes for a virtual document.

versionLabelParamVersioning.name: version-label
versionLabelParamVersioning.description: Specifies one or more version labels of the checked in object.

latestVersionsOnlyParamVersioning.name: latest-versions-only
latestVersionsOnlyParamVersioning.description: Specifies whether only get the latest version.

makeCurrentParamVersioning.name: make-current
makeCurrentParamVersioning.description: Determines whether or not to make this check-in the current version.

retainLockParamVersioning.name: retain-lock
retainLockParamVersioning.description: Specifies whether or not to keep the object checked out and locked by the user after the new version is saved.

contentCharsetParamVersioning.name: content-charset
contentCharsetParamVersioning.description: The charset of the content uploaded.

contentCountParamVersioning.name: content-count
contentCountParamVersioning.description: The count of the content uploaded.

versionPolicyParamVersioning.name: version-policy
versionPolicyParamVersioning.description: Specifies the version policy for the object to check in with.

allPrimaryParamVersioning.name: all-primary
allPrimaryParamVersioning.description: Whether save all contents as primary on different pages.

chronicleIdParamVersioning.name: chronicleId
chronicleIdParamVersioning.description: Specifies the chronicle id of the object.

commentParamVersioning.name: comment
commentParamVersioning.description: Specifies the comment for a check-in operation.

viewParam.name: view
viewParam.description:
Properties to return. The pattern is like:?view=(:view-name)?(,column)*. (:view-name) and (,columns)* must be mutually exclusive names of predefined views start with colon (':'). The following view-name are defined: :all :default

If no view-name is specified, names of properties or predefined views should be returned, separated by comma (',').

asyncParam.name: async
asyncParam.description: Whether async upload when distributed content writing.

queueIdParam.name: queueId
queueIdParam.description: The object id of the work queue.

contentLengthParamInFolderChildObjects.name: content-length
contentLengthParamInFolderChildObjects.description: The byte count of the content uploaded. A comma separated list can be used to define multiple values for this parameter.

delVersionParam.name: del-version
delVersionParam.description: Delete options for multi-version document object. * 'selected_version', delete selected version only. * 'non_used_versions', delete non used versions. * 'all_versions', delete all versions.

delegateUserParam.name: delegate-user
delegateUserParam.description: Specifies the user to be delegated for a workflow task, this is mandatory when action is DELEGATE, for other actions, the value will be ignored.

primaryParam.name: primary
primaryParam.description: Specifies whether the imported content is primary content or a rendition.

contentCharsetParam.name: content-charset
contentCharsetParam.description: The charset of the content uploaded.

depthParam.name: depth
depthParam.description: Specifies to what depth level the virtual document hierarchy will be returned. -1 means return the whole virtual document tree.

recursiveParamInGroups.name: recursive
recursiveParamInGroups.description: Whether return users included in sub groups. * 'true', would include sub groups' users. * 'false', only return users which directly belong to given group.

userNameQueryParamInWorkQueues.name: user-name
userNameQueryParamInWorkQueues.description: Specifies the login name of user to whom the work queues belong. Defaults to currently loggged in user.

accessorParam.name: accessor
accessorParam.description: Specifies a user or group name to check his permissions on this object.

frozenParam.name: frozen
frozenParam.description: Specifies whether to freeze the snapshot right after creation.

groupNameQueryParamInGroups.name: group-name
groupNameQueryParamInGroups.description: Specifies the group name to get parent groups which contains this group.

recursiveParamInTypes.name: recursive
recursiveParamInTypes.description: Specifies whether get direct or indirect sub types

formatNameParam.name: formatName
formatNameParam.description: The name of the dm_format object.

modifierParam.name: modifier
modifierParam.description: uniquely identifies a rendition within the same page number and format for a document. If there already exists a rendition with the supplied page_modifier (at the given format and page) the rendition will be overwritten. If null is passed then page_modifier is set to empty string.

templateIdParam.name: templateId
templateIdParam.description: The object id of the workflow template.

commentIdParam.name: commentId
commentIdParam.description: The r_object_id of the comment instance.

auditScopeQueryParam.name: audit-scope
auditScopeQueryParam.description: The scope of the audit event would effect to register and would use with 'object-id' to get the intersection to operate. * 'repository', means the event would register over whole repository. * 'type', means the event would register over type. * 'object', means the event would register over object.

noteIdParam.name: noteId
noteIdParam.description: The id of the workflow task package's note.

supervisorParam.name: supervisor
supervisorParam.description: Specifies the new supervisor name when action is CHANGE-SUPERVISOR.

hideSharedParentParam.name: hide-shared-parent
hideSharedParentParam.description: Whether hide the shared parent of child folders.

contentLengthParamInObjectLightweightObj.name: content-length
contentLengthParamInObjectLightweightObj.description: The byte count of the content uploaded.

contentLengthParamInContents.name: content-length
contentLengthParamInContents.description: The byte count of the content uploaded.

signoffPasswordParam.name: signoff-password
signoffPasswordParam.description: Specifies the signoff password when the action is SIGNOFF, this value will be ignored for other actions.

queueNamesParam.name: queue-names
queueNamesParam.description: Specifies the names of queues which the tasks are inside. Separated by commas.

unsuspendTimeParam.name: unsuspend-time
unsuspendTimeParam.description: Specifies the absolute date and time when the task must be unsuspended automatically. Used when performing a SUSPEND action. Pass in NULL if the timer is not used for suspending the task. The date format should comply with ISO 8601.

traceParam.name: trace
traceParam.description: Whether make the audit trail traceable when purging it.

assignPerformersParam.name: assign-performers
assignPerformersParam.description: Specifies URL encoded user names and/or group names to whom the target activity will be assigned. Separated by commas. Mandatory when performing ASSIGN action. Ignored for other actions.

itemIdParam.name: itemId
itemIdParam.description: The object id of the inbox item.

relationIdParam.name: relationId
relationIdParam.description: The r_object_id of the relation instance.

objectTypeParam.name: object-type
objectTypeParam.description: The type of the queried object.

vdmNumberParam.name: vdm-number
vdmNumberParam.description:
The node's number in the virtual document tree. The schema of vdm-number is based on the level of the node, e.g.,
* 1st level, 1, 2, 3, ...
* 2nd level, 1.1, 1.2, 3.1, ...
* 3rd level, 1.1.1, 1.1.2, 1.1.3, ...
* ...

formatQueryParam.name: format
formatQueryParam.description: The format of the content uploaded.

userNameQueryParamInQueueTasks.name: user-name
userNameQueryParamInQueueTasks.description: Specifies the login name of user to whom the queue tasks belong. Defaults to currently logged in user.

inheritedParam.name: inherited
inheritedParam.description: Specifies whether or not to include all of the properties of a type including the inherited properties from the parent type.

includeLifecycleParam.name: include-lifecycle
includeLifecycleParam.description: Specifies whether or not to get the type related information for the different lifecycles and states.

allContentsParam.name: all-contents
allContentsParam.description: Specifies whether to include all contents of an object or only get the first page contents. * 'true', would include all contents of the specified objects. * 'false', would only include the first page contents of the specified objects.

includedPropertiesParam.name: included-properties
includedPropertiesParam.description: The property names to be included in the Response. The property names are comma separated. For example, included-properties=attr1,attr2,attr3

userNameParamInCheckedOutObjects.name: user-name
userNameParamInCheckedOutObjects.description: Specifies the user name of the lock owner. Only works when the checked-out-by parameter is set to specific-user

aspectTypeNameParam.name: aspectTypeName
aspectTypeNameParam.description: The name of the aspect type.

nodeIdParam.name: nodeId
nodeIdParam.description: The id of virtual document node, which is actually r_object_id of relation instance.

networkLocationParam.name: network-location
networkLocationParam.description: The network location for distributed content write.

actionParamInWorkflowTemplate.name: action
actionParamInWorkflowTemplate.description: Specifies what action will be done on the workflow template, currently, only these actions are supported, VALIDATE,INSTALL,INVALIDATE,UNINSTALL.

quickFlowParam.name: quick-flow
quickFlowParam.description: Specifies whether to start an ad-hoc workflow or start a workflow from template. * 'true', would creates and starts an ad-hoc workflow to route objects to users and/or groups. * 'false', would creates and starts a workflow from the template.

workflowIdParam.name: workflowId
workflowIdParam.description: The object id of the workflow instance.

parentTypeParam.name: parent-type
parentTypeParam.description: Gets direct sub types or all sub types of the specified type.

checkSubscriptionParam.name: check-subscription
checkSubscriptionParam.description: Ensures whether to show subscriptions on the object instance. * 'true', return subscriptions on the object instance. * 'false', do not return subscriptions on the object instance.

auditScopeParam.name: audit-scope
auditScopeParam.description: The scope of the audit event would effect to register and would use with 'object-id' to get the intersection to operate. * 'repository', means the event would register over whole repository. * 'type', means the event would register over type. * 'object', means the event would register over object.

allPrimaryParam.name: all-primary
allPrimaryParam.description: Whether save all contents as primary on different pages.

mediaUrlPolicyParam.name: media-url-policy
mediaUrlPolicyParam.description: Specifies the content media URL return policy. * 'dc-pref', would try to retrieve a distributed content URL first. If no distributed content URL is available, a Content Media resource URL from the REST server is still acceptable. * 'dc-only', return a distributed content URL. If there is no ACS server or BOCS server, the REST server returns the HTTP 400 Conflict error. * 'local', return a Content Media resource URL from the REST server regardless of the availability of the ACS server and the BOCS server. * 'all', all available Content Media links are returned.

relatedObjectIdParam.name: related-object-id
relatedObjectIdParam.description: The r_object_id of the related object in the relation.

overwriteParam.name: overwrite
overwriteParam.description: Specifies whether or not to overwrite the existing content with the same content properties. * 'true', would overwrite the existing primary content. * 'false', throw an exception when the primary content or rendition with the same content properties already exists.

includeValueConstraintsParam.name: include-value-constraints
includeValueConstraintsParam.description: Specifies whether or not to get the type and properties value constraints information.

indexParam.name: index
indexParam.description: The index of the package in the workflow task packages.

includeAllParam.name: include-all
includeAllParam.description: Specifies whether or not to get all the type related information.

filterTypeParam.name: filter-type
filterTypeParam.description: Specifies the range of tasks to be filtered. The following values are supported.(case insensitive) * ALL, Shows all tasks in the work queue. * UNASSIGNED, Shows unassigned tasks in the work queue. * ELIGIBLE_AND_OWNED, Shows the tasks that the processor can work on and the tasks that the processor owns in the work queue. * ELIGIBLE, Shows the tasks that the processor can work on in the work queue.

categoryParam.name: category
categoryParam.description: The category in Synonyms built-in dictionary of CCE(Contextual Content Engine) to search for word.

networkLocationIdentifierParam.name: networkLocationIdentifier
networkLocationIdentifierParam.description: The netloc_identifier of the dm_network_location_map location object.

queryLocaleParam.name: query-locale
queryLocaleParam.description: A locale used to evaluate the query and parse word into language dependent token. Only supported with xPlore.

includeAuditableEventsParam.name: include-auditable-events
includeAuditableEventsParam.description: Specifies whether or not to get the type auditable system and app events.

suggestionViewParam.name: suggestion-view
suggestionViewParam.description: The suggestion view for the word to be checked in CCE(Contextual Content Engine). * 'typeahead' or do not provide, would give typeahead results of given word. * 'homophone', would give homophone results of given word. * 'all', would give both typeahead and homophone results of given word.

memberNameParam.name: memberName
memberNameParam.description: The encoded name of sub group.

recursiveParamInGroupMemberUsers.name: recursive
recursiveParamInGroupMemberUsers.description: Whether return users included in sub groups. * 'true', would include sub groups' users. * 'false', only return users which directly belong to given group.

actionParamInWorkflow.name: action
actionParamInWorkflow.description: Specifies what action will be done on the workflow instance, currently, only these actions are supported, RESTART,RESTART-ALL,HALT,HALT-ALL,RESUME,RESUME-ALL,ABORT,CHANGE-SUPERVISOR.

delNonEmptyParam.name: del-non-empty
delNonEmptyParam.description: Ensures whether to delete the folder instance when it is not empty. * 'true', would delete the folder and all of its descendants. * 'false', would not delete the folder instance only.

actionParamInQueueTask.name: action
actionParamInQueueTask.description: Specifies what action to perform on the work queue task. The following actions are supported. * HOLD, Sets the work item a_held_by to indicate if the task is being worked on. * REASSIGN, Reassigns this task to the specified user, user-name is required, and pulled is optional. This action will unsuspend a suspended task. * SUSPEND, Suspends this task with the specified expected unsuspend date and time, unsuspend-time is optional. * UNSUSPEND, Unsuspends or resumes this task. * UNHOLD, Releases the task.

docIdsParam.name: doc-ids
docIdsParam.description: The r_object_id of the documents that needs to be checked with CCE(Contextual Content Engine).

wordParam.name: word
wordParam.description: The word that needs to be passed to CCE(Contextual Content Engine) to check.

relatedObjectRoleParam.name: related-object-role
relatedObjectRoleParam.description: The role of the related object. Only when 'related-object-id' is provided would take effect. * 'any'='0', role can be parent or child. * 'parent'='1', role should be parent. * 'child'='2', role should be child.

checkedOutByParam.name: checked-out-by
checkedOutByParam.description: Specifies the lock owner of the checked out objects with the following valid values

includeDisplayConfigsParam.name: include-display-configs
includeDisplayConfigsParam.description: Specifies whether or not to get the type display configuration information.

forceParamInAcl.name: force
forceParamInAcl.description: Indicates whether to destroy the ACL object even if it is referenced by other objects in the repository. * 'true', would destroy the ACL object even if it is referenced by other objects in the repository. * 'false', do not destroy the ACL object if it is referenced by other objects.

parentFolderIdParam.name: parentFolderId
parentFolderIdParam.description: The r_object_id of parent folder for the object.

snapshotIdParam.name: snapshotId
snapshotIdParam.description: The r_object_id of the associated snapshot.

includeMappingTablesParam.name: include-mapping-tables
includeMappingTablesParam.description: Specifies whether or not to get the type and properties mapping table information.

dmlViewParam.name: dml-view
dmlViewParam.description: Specifies what shall be returned for the collection.

contentCountParam.name: content-count
contentCountParam.description: The count of the content uploaded.

displayConfigParam.name: display-config
displayConfigParam.description: Specifies whether to get type properties based on the specified scope and display configuration. The value you can set is the display configuration display name. The scope-configuration and display-configuration must be provided together.

formatParam.name: format
formatParam.description: The format of the content uploaded.

pulledParam.name: pulled
pulledParam.description: Set to true to indicate that it's an end user's action, or false if a supervisor or administrator assigns the task. Defaults to false.

contentLengthParamInFolderChildDocuments.name: content-length
contentLengthParamInFolderChildDocuments.description: The byte count of the content uploaded. A comma separated list can be used to define multiple values for this parameter.

userNameQueryParamInQueueTask.name: user-name
userNameQueryParamInQueueTask.description: Specifies the login name of the user to whom the task will be reassigned.

typeNameParam.name: typeName
typeNameParam.description: Specifies the name of the type.

activityIdParam.name: activityId
activityIdParam.description: The object id of the workflow activity.

bindingLabelParam.name: binding-label
bindingLabelParam.description: Specifies the version label to use to resolve late bound nodes for a virtual document.

includeValueAssistParam.name: include-value-assist
includeValueAssistParam.description: Specifies whether the Response includes the definition information of the value assist.

repeatUsersParam.name: repeat-users
repeatUsersParam.description: Specifies the user names and/or group names to repeat the workflow task, and more values are separated by the comma, e.g. userA,userB,groupC. This is mandatory when action is REPEAT, for other actions,this value will be ignored.

requireDcWriteParam.name: require-dc-write
requireDcWriteParam.description: Whether the document requires distributed content upload

itemTypeParam.name: item-type
itemTypeParam.description: Specifies what kind of items the inbox should return. By default is to return all notifications and workflow tasks, namely 7, it is value of 0x001|0x0002|0x0004. It can be any of the following value bitwise OR'ed together. * '0xFFFF', (DF_ALL) including all notifications and tasks. * '0x0001', (DF_NOTIFICATION) including only notifications but not queued notifications. * '0x0002', (DF_QUEUED) including only queued notifications. * '0x0004', (DF_WORKFLOWTASK) including only workflow tasks * '0x0008', (DF_ROUTERTASK) including only router task.

includeChildrenParam.name: include-children
includeChildrenParam.description: Specifies whether to get its child nodes' contents for a virtual document. * 'true', would include its child nodes' contents. * 'false', do not include its child nodes' contents, means only get this root node's contents.

stateParam.name: state
stateParam.description: The state name of the lifecycle.

delVdAllParam.name: del-vd-all
delVdAllParam.description: Whether remove the all the descendants if the object is virtual.

userNameQueryParamInGroups.name: user-name
userNameQueryParamInGroups.description: Specifies the username to get parent groups which contains this user.

includeBrokenParam.name: include-broken
includeBrokenParam.description: Specifies whether to include nodes with broken bindings for a virtual document. * 'true', would include nodes with broken bindings with current version. * 'false', do not include nodes with broken bindings.

delAllLinksParam.name: del-all-links
delAllLinksParam.description: Ensures whether to unlink the links on folder instance and all its descendants when deleted. * 'true', would delete the folder and all descendants, regardless of other folders into which they are linked * 'false', would unlink folder descendants from the folder being deleted if the folder descendants have links to other folders, and to remove folder descendants that are only linked to the folder being deleted.

recursiveParamInGroupMemberGroups.name: recursive
recursiveParamInGroupMemberGroups.description: Whether return users included in sub groups. * 'true', would include sub groups' users. * 'false', only return users which directly belong to given group.

followAssemblyParam.name: follow-assembly
followAssemblyParam.description: The follow-assembly property determines whether the server selects component descendants using the containment objects or a snapshot associated with the component. Only when follow-assembly is true and there is a snapshot, then the server selects components from the snapshot.

scopeConfigParam.name: scope-config
scopeConfigParam.description: Specifies whether to get type properties based on the specified scope and display configuration. The value you can set is the scope configuration name. The scope-configuration and the display-configuration must be provided together.

actionParamInInboxItem.name: action
actionParamInInboxItem.description: Specifies what action will be done on the workflow task inbox item, currently, only these actions are supported, ACQUIRE,FORWARD,REJECT,DELEGATE,REPEAT,SIGNOFF.
